description: What Vice President Harris' speech last night says about the way she'll tackle her upcoming debate, her first major interview, and the 70-odd day sprint to the election.
title: Harris' next big challenges

description: The company says the hackers posed as tech support to target people affiliated with President Biden and Donald Trump, in the latest evidence of Iran’s attempts to influence the 2024 election.
title: Meta takes down more accounts tied to Iranian hackers targeting the U.S. election

description: Four days, dozens of speakers and many balloons later, the 2024 Democratic National Convention is officially over.
title: What we saw at the DNC in Chicago

description: Maybe you're COVID indifferent. Or a COVID amnesiac. Or a NOVID who wants to keep your no COVID streak going. With cases rising this summer, it's time for a refresher course on how to avoid the virus.
title: Coronavirus FAQ: I'm a NOVID and don't want to catch COVID. Can you guide me?

description: The lawsuit says RealPage’s algorithmic pricing software lets landlords effectively collude and set rents above market rate. The Texas-based company has denied the allegations.
title: DOJ accuses real estate software company of helping landlords collude to raise rents

description: Federal Reserve chairman Jerome Powell signaled that he's increasingly confident inflation will soon be tamed, and that he and his colleagues will soon cut interest rates to avoid hurting the job market.
title: 'The time has come' to lower interest rates: Fed Chair Jerome Powell

description: Vice President Harris takes center stage at the Democratic National Convention tonight. Here's what to expect.
title: All eyes are on Harris at the DNC tonight

description: Independent presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. has filed paperwork to withdraw his name from Arizona's ballot, a sign his long-shot candidacy may be ending.
title: RFK's withdrawal from Arizona's ballot signals a likely end to his presidential bid

description: Food prices are still high, but your grocery bill doesn't have to be. Beth Moncel, founder of Budget Bytes, shares smart tips how to save money at the supermarket.
title: 9 smart ways to slash your grocery bill

description: Kamala Harris had a historic night on DNC's final night with her acceptance speech. Here are some key takeaways from this convention week. And, a look at why Democrats are thrilled.
title: Harris tells her story on historic night. And who else showed up on DNC's final night

description: Indigenous and Black people tell their own seafaring stories at Mystique Seaport Museum
title: Indigenous and Black people tell their own stories at the Mystic Seaport Museum

description: The two discount retailers have been battling it out in court for months, accusing each other of intimidation, theft and fraud. Both ship much of their items directly from China
title: The giant of fast fashion Shein is suing its ultracheap rival Temu

description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Republican pollster John McLaughlin about how former President Donald Trump can win back the White House in November.
title: With Kamala Harris leading in the polls, can Donald Trump come back?

description: Vice President Kamala Harris gave the biggest speech of her political career Thursday night to cap off the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.
title: In accepting the presidential nomination, Harris promised to put country first

description: Indigenous and Black people tell their own seafaring stories at Mystique Seaport Museum
title: Indigenous and Black people tell their seafaring stories at the Mystic Seaport Museum

description: Negotiations between Canadian National Railway, Canadian Pacific Kansas City and the Teamsters union, which represents 10,000 of the companies' employees, began about a year ago.
title: Canada orders a third party to mediate a labor dispute between railways and employees

description: Activists noted that Native American voter turnout in swing states is what helped President Biden win during the last cycle.
title: Democrats court Native American voters at their convention in Chicago

description: While Vice President Harris called the suffering in Gaza "heartbreaking," activists say they were hoping a Palestinian American would have also been allowed to speak at the convention.
title: Uncommitted delegates at DNC were denied a speaking slot to address Gaza conditions

description: Gun violence, race, climate change and, of course, Donald Trump were themes of the night that culminated in Kamala Harris  accepting the Democratic Party's nomination for president.
title: WATCH: DNC Night 4 speeches from Harris, Whitmer, Sharpton, Kinzinger and more

description: Her speech, at only 38 minutes, was the 12th-shortest in modern history, while her opponent holds the records for the three longest acceptance speeches in American political history.
title: Harris had one of the shortest acceptance speeches in history. Trump had the longest

description: Former President Donald Trump was posting on Truth Social throughout Kamala Harris' DNC speech, where she formally accepted the party's nomination for president.
title: Fact checking Trump's claims during Harris' acceptance speech

description: Whitmer called Trump "that man from Mar-a-Lago" while also brushing off his previous remarks by saying being from Michigan is "a badge of honor."
title: Gretchen Whitmer takes jabs at Trump: 'Donald Trump doesn't know you at all'

description: After much speculation, Vice President Harris, now the Democratic nominee for president, came out with the strongest remarks so far on where she stands on the Israel-Hamas war and the humanitarian crisis in Gaza.
title: Harris says Israel 'has right to defend itself,' Palestinians need 'dignity, security'

description: Cooper delivered the final remarks ahead of Vice President Harris’ keynote address, vowing that a Harris administration would fight for everyday Americans.
title: North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper says Harris will fight for America
